hero.subtitle: Authentic Peruvian Cuisine
hero.title: El Rincón de Jorgito
hero.description: Experience the genuine flavors of Peru in the heart of San Francisco. Our carefully crafted dishes bring the essence of Peruvian culinary tradition to your table.

about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: A Taste of Peru in San Francisco
about.story: El Rincón de Jorgito began with a simple vision: to share the rich culinary heritage of Peru with San Francisco. Founded by Jorge Mendoza in 2015, our restaurant combines traditional techniques with locally sourced ingredients to create an authentic yet innovative dining experience.
about.vision: Every dish tells a story of Peru's diverse cultural influences – from indigenous Andean traditions to Spanish, African, Chinese, and Japanese cuisines that have shaped Peru's gastronomic landscape.
about.chefDesc: Chef Jorge Mendoza brings over 20 years of experience, having trained in Lima's finest restaurants before bringing his expertise to California. His passion for Peruvian flavors and dedication to culinary excellence defines every aspect of El Rincón de Jorgito.
